nodes.text: Jedi artifacts were items created by the Jedi. During the New Republic Era, the Force-sensitive Karr Nuq Sin undertook a search of the galaxy for Jedi artifacts. After the Great Jedi Purge, some Jedi artifacts were stolen by Darth Sidious.[source?] At some point, the Resistance spy Vi Moradi learned that the First Order's Supreme Leader, Kylo Ren, looked favorably upon any scouting party that returned with Jedi or Sith artifacts.
